name: Himitsu Kessha Q
overview: Himitsu Kessha Q is a mix between an adventure and a tactical rpg game. In the game the player controls a special unit in a the future commanded by the game main's character that uses a white armor suit and that is trying to protect the Earth from an alien invasion. The gameplay is before each mission there is an adventure part in which the player can choose between 2 possible answers, and the mission part is a tactical rpg style: The player character got a limited range of movement and when there is an encounter with an enemy the perspective makes a close up and use a 3d engine to show the combat. The player characters got different kind of units and attack (with a sword, a gun, etc.) that makes different damage to the enemies.
